# Master build script for CMake (automatically generated by "mrb newDev")

# Require minimum cmake version
CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED (VERSION 2.8)

# Add top level include
include_directories ( ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR} )
include_directories ("/usr/local/include/mongocxx/v_noabi")
include_directories ("/usr/local/include/bsoncxx/v_noabi")

# Enable testing
enable_testing()

# add_subdirectory and other commands will be added below by @mrb gitCheckout@ for each package

# If you add a package by hand, you MUST also add the appropriate package block below
# Remove the appropriate package block below if you delete a product from your srcs area
# Or, use mrb uc to update this file safely

# DO NOT DELETE 
# artdaq_core_demo package block
set(artdaq_core_demo_not_in_ups true)
include_directories ( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/artdaq_core_demo )
include_directories ( $ENV{MRB_BUILDDIR}/artdaq_core_demo )
# artdaq_demo package block
set(artdaq_demo_not_in_ups true)
include_directories ( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/artdaq_demo )
include_directories ( $ENV{MRB_BUILDDIR}/artdaq_demo )
# artdaq package block
set(artdaq_not_in_ups true)
include_directories ( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/artdaq )
include_directories ( $ENV{MRB_BUILDDIR}/artdaq )

# DO NOT DELETE 
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(artdaq_core_demo)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(artdaq_demo)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(artdaq)
